item.description:
It's not often that one Potluck speaker channels a comment about another.
Our April 18 Potluck speaker Gregory Scott, EdD, was called a "universal
avatar" by our February Potluck Angel Channeler, Nancy Holland. Gregory will
discuss and demonstrate some of the key aspects of his program: group
healing, Soul Consciousness, Ascension and how to eliminate karma as steps
toward total energy transformation. We welcome Gregory and look forward to
his workshops at the Place of Light.

So bring enough food to feed at least 4 other people and be ready for good conversation and great company!
item.name: Paths to Light April Meetup
